query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS study_paths (
  id VARCHAR(128) PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  
  -- Analysis results
  weakestCategory VARCHAR(50),
  weakestScore DECIMAL(3,1),
  targetScore DECIMAL(3,1) DEFAULT 9.6,
  
  -- Study plan
  currentLevel VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'beginner',
  totalMilestones INT DEFAULT 10,
  completedMilestones INT DEFAULT 0,
  progressPercentage DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  
  -- Curated resources
  researchPapers TEXT,
  practiceQuestions TEXT,
  recommendedReadings TEXT,
  
  -- Adaptive learning
  learningStyle VARCHAR(50),
  estimatedCompletionDays INT,
  lastActivityDate TIMESTAMP,
  
  -- Timestamps
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  
  INDEX idx_user (userId),
  INDEX idx_progress (progressPercentage DESC)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:

  -- Timestamps

  INDEX idx_user (userId),
  INDEX idx_progress (progressPercentage DESC)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
